properties.description: Used to populate tables in the PortThesausus DB

activities.name: ExecuteCreateTaxonomyTermsSource
activities.description: Create the Taxonomy terms source tab using a query.

activities.name: LocalToDboTermType
activities.description: Create the TermType table on the Azure DB using a query.

activities.name: CreateTermTable
activities.description: Create the term table using a query.

properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

sources.name: ThesaurusTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms

sources.name: TaxonomyTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms

sources.name: TermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DimID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred,
		DimID,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: LookupTypesWithDimID
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
Select1, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
Filter1 split(isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Delete, Default)

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID
	))~> Select1

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		TermDescription,
		TermName,
		TermCode,
		DimID = TermDimID,
		Available,
		TermTypeID,
		Preferred = TermPreferred
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: AlterRow2
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit1@Delete alterRow(updateIf(TermID==286337)) ~> AlterRow2

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: MergeJoin filter(TermID == 286337) ~> Filter1

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script: AlterRow2 derive(Available = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1

properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

sources.name: ThesaurusTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms

sources.name: TaxonomyTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms

sources.name: TermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes

sinks.name: InsertSink
sinks.script:
Select2 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID = TermTypeID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = TermPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> InsertSink

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: LookupTypesWithDimID
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
Select1, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID
	))~> Select1

transformations.name: InsertBranch
transformations.script: MergeJoin filter(isNull(TermID)) ~> InsertBranch

transformations.name: SetAvailable
transformations.script:
InsertBranch derive(Available = true(),
		RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> SetAvailable

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
SetAvailable, TermTypes lookup(RootTypeID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script:
Lookup1 derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> DerivedColumn1

transformations.name: AlterRow1
transformations.script: DerivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(DimID)))) ~> AlterRow1

transformations.name: Select2
transformations.script:
AlterRow1 select(mapColumn(
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		TermDescription = DimDescription,
		TermPreferred = DimPreferred,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID
	))~> Select2

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
Filter1 split(not(isNull(TermID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Update, Default)

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),

transformations.name: AlterRow2
transformations.script: ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(TermID==286337)) ~> AlterRow2

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: MergeJoin filter(TermID == 286337) ~> Filter1

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script:
AlterRow2 derive(DimTypeName = TermName,
		DimTypeDescription = DimDescription,
		DimPreferred = DimPreferred) ~> DerivedColumn1

		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateSink

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
Filter2 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,

		Preferred as boolean,

		DimID,

		Description,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available,
		TermTypeID = TaxonomyTerms@TermTypeID
	)) ~> InsertSink

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: LookupTypesWithDimID
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',

transformations.name: MergeJoin

Select1, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,

		PossibleTypeID,

transformations.script:

		DimPreferred,
		TermDescription,
		TermName,
		TermCode,
		DimID,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: MergeJoin filter(TermID == 286337) ~> Filter1

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
Filter1 derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: AlterRow3
transformations.script: ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> AlterRow3

transformations.name: InsertBranch
transformations.script: MergeJoin filter(isNull(TermID)) ~> InsertBranch

transformations.name: AddAvailableColumn
transformations.script: MergeJoin derive(Available = true()) ~> AddAvailableColumn

transformations.name: Delete
transformations.script: AddAvailableColumn alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> Delete

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script: Delete derive(Available = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1

transformations.name: UpdateColumns
transformations.script:
AlterRow3 derive(TermName = DimName,
		DimDescription = DimDescription,
		DimPreferred = DimPreferred) ~> UpdateColumns

transformations.name: Filter2
transformations.script: DerivedColumn1 filter(isNull(DimID)) ~> Filter2

transformations.name: SetAvailable
transformations.script:
InsertBranch derive(Available = true(),
		RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> SetAvailable

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
SetAvailable, TermTypes join(RootTypeID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: AlterRow4
transformations.script: Join1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TermID))) ~> AlterRow4

properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

sources.name: ThesaurusTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms

sources.name: TaxonomyTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms

sources.name: TermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes

sinks.name: TaxonomyTermsInsert
sinks.script:
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermName,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID = RootTypeID
	)) ~> TaxonomyTermsInsert

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Available
	)) ~> DeleteSink

sinks.name: UpdateTerm
sinks.script:
ConditionsForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: LookupTypesWithDimID
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: SetAvailable
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit1@Insert derive(Available = true()) ~> SetAvailable

transformations.name: ConvertRootToTypeID
transformations.script: SetAvailable derive(RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> ConvertRootToTypeID

transformations.name: LookupTypeWithRootID
transformations.script:
ConvertRootToTypeID, TermTypes join(RootID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypeWithRootID

transformations.name: SelectFromLookup
transformations.script:
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		SourceID
	))~> SelectFromLookup

transformations.name: ConditionsForInsertion
transformations.script: LookupTypeWithRootID alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(RootTypeID)))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: ConditionsForInsertion filter(isNull(TermPreferred)) ~> Filter1

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimPreferred,
		TermName,
		RootTypeID,
		Available = TermTypes@Available
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: ConditionsForDelete
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit1@Delete alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> ConditionsForDelete

transformations.name: SelectForDelete
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Available
	))~> SelectForDelete

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConvertNameAndDesc select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimPreferred,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: Filter2
transformations.script: SelectForUpdate filter(TermID == 286337) ~> Filter2

transformations.name: ConditionsForUpdate
transformations.script: Filter2 alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script: ConditionsForDelete derive(Available = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1

		DimID,

		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> TaxonomyTermsInsert

sinks.name: UpdateTerm
sinks.script:
ConditionsForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Available
	)) ~> DeleteSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: SetAvailable
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Available = true()) ~> SetAvailable

transformations.name: ConvertRootToTypeID
transformations.script: SetAvailable derive(RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> ConvertRootToTypeID

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: ConditionsForInsertion
transformations.script: LookupTypeWithRootID alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(TermTypes@TermTypeID)))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimPreferred,
		TermName = DimName,
		TermTypeID = RootTypeID,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: ConditionsForDelete
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Delete alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> ConditionsForDelete

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script: ConditionsForDelete derive(Available = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1

transformations.name: SelectForDelete
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Available
	))~> SelectForDelete

transformations.name: LookupTypesWithDimID
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes lookup(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID

transformations.name: SelectFromLookup
transformations.script:
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimName,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimSourceID,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID
	))~> SelectFromLookup

transformations.name: LookupTypeWithRootID
transformations.script:
ConvertRootToTypeID, TermTypes lookup(RootTypeID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypeWithRootID

transformations.name: ConditionsForUpdate
transformations.script: Filter1 alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConvertNameAndDesc select(mapColumn(
		DimName = DimTypeName,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription = DimTypeDescription,
		TermID
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: SelectForUpdate filter(not(isNull(DimName))) ~> Filter1

transformations.name: Filter2
transformations.script: ConditionsForInsertion filter(not(isNull(DimName))) ~> Filter2
